title: Red Tracker
body:
Can you PLEASE make it so instead of filling the page with every red comment in sepperate "threads" you nest them under the same thread in which that specific riot commented?

So instead of showing a page full of comments by Riot Superfoxman, it will show X number of replies to (K) thread by this rioter!

If another (B) rioter posts in that same thread Y times it will show B has responded Y times in (K) thread! This way, I dont feel like Im being spammed.

replies.body: Hey Jamnon, I replied to this on [another similar thread here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/Ycc11N8g-fix-the-red-tracker?comment=0001). Appreciate the feedback!
